name: Ergonized
description:
Ergonized is a registered Salesforce consulting partner with over 12 years of experience in consulting and development.
We help clients achieve their business objectives and engage with their clients through the Salesforce platform. We are different because we will collaborate with you as partners, not as vendors. We strive to understand your business goals and design a strategy to deliver the best return on your investment. Clients’ success matters to us.
 
We believe in an innovative approach. Standard solutions can no longer bring enough advantages for companies to become leaders! We discuss, analyze, and focus on clients’ strengths to leverage innovative solutions that will make a difference.
Our services:
Salesforce consulting, implementation, requirements, design, and architecture
AppExchange apps: managed packages implementation, security review
Lightning migration and component development
Integration: 3rd-party apps, legacy, and in-house apps, Tableau, Mulesoft
Certified consultants with excellent communication skills and the ability to travel across USA, Canada, United Kingdom, and Europe
Delivery team with multiple Salesforce certifications (Sales Cloud Consultant, Service Cloud Consultant, Community Cloud Consultant, CPQ Specialist, Marketing Cloud Consultant, Pardot Consultant, Pardot Specialist, Non-profit Cloud Consultant, Salesforce Certified Platform Developer I/II, Platform App Builder, Salesforce Administrator)
